column4: Hey , guys i am trying to add a country-specific repository to my software Sources... Do you guys know where the country-Specific list is stored?  Have a look here: http://i41.tinypic.com/s3pwtj.png
what kind of "country-specific repository" a full mirror ??
jrib is right if it is not there you will have to add it manually editing /etc/apt/sources.list
